title: Oh Cooking Masters….
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Yoshiko, how are you doing over there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane! Phew…. What a pointless question, Mari. The ingredients are screaming from Yohane’s magical powers…. How are you doing yourself, little demon<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s all good on Mari’s side too~. I’m sure that it will surpass the stewshine<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>With this, we can definitely get Kanata to go “Guh”....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hey, do people really go “Guh” when they’re shocked? I’ve been wondering about that for a while~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I-, it’s just the expression for stuff like these!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Ok. Let's just say they do. More importantly~, try tasting it♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>*Munch*.... It’s reeeeally strange. For such a horrible appearance, this taste is…. perfect, it’s delicious<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! Let’s show her that Mari and Yoshiko are good at cooking too~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Like I said, it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
